reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the scent and the way my skin feels!
reviews.reviewText: First time trying this and I love the scent, my wife loves it too. Lots of lather and I can tell it's going to last. I love the fresh and clean feeling it gives my skin. I wish the scent lasted longer though. Overall I'm happy with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I rarely write reviews but, I love this product. It does the job, last a long time, and smells really good!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The first time I use this bar I was blowing away it was easily taking the surface of the dry skin off. It wasn’t oily and smell fantastic. It was a little pricey, but sometimes you had to treat yourself. I would buy another one again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Made the switch from Squatch an haven't looked back!
reviews.reviewText: I can't say enough good stuff about this bar soap from Baxter of California. I have very dry skin and have always had a hard time finding a soap that left my skin feeling moisturized and left me NOT looking like Ashy Larry. I was a very loyal Dr. Squatch user, but was frustrated by how quickly the bars were gone. After seeing how many positive reviews there were for this soap, I decided to give it a try. It's been almost a year since I switched and I am never using another soap.The bars last almost exactly 30 days, so while the price tag seems high, it actually ends up being cheaper than using a $7 bar of Dr. Squatch every week. I am 6' 4" and have a bigger frame, so I would imagine it will last even longer on someone who is of more average size!The smell is masculine and smells like cedar and kind of musky. I get compliments regularly for the scent and my wife enjoys the smell as well. The lather is creamy, and the exfoliating particles are not too abrasive, they are just right. I use this on my entire body and have never experienced any adverse effects.I highly recommend this soap for dudes with dry skin who like to smell good!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Smell for Him or Her
reviews.reviewText: THIS... is Baxter's Cedarwood and Oak Moss Essence bar of soap (2 pack) and I have fallen in love with it. I don't usually use bar soap, but was recently convinced to try it out and I am glad I did!This bar of soap smells amazing, and while I would say it is generally a male-leaning scent... my fiance uses it before her bodywash because it smells so good, and the cleaning beads work really well. It suds up quite well, but not too much. I find that this bar of soap does congeal up slightly between uses like other high-end bars of soap from water being left on it, so I recommend putting it in a container between washes to keep it from washing away.I thought that this was expensive for a bar of soap, however, it is well worth the extra money and I can tell a difference from my old dove and irish spring bars of soap that I kept around. I really feel that the beads and soap clean and scrub well! Will be returning to buy more for me and my fiance now and am hooked on Baxter soap!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this feeling🥰
reviews.reviewText: I like the smell of it.My skin gets to be filled with the sensation of pure satisfaction 📍

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars This is not a 2-pack
reviews.reviewText: My fault for not paying closer attention, but I thought I was buying two bars for $20. I would never pay this much for one bar of soap.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2016
reviews.reviewText: My evaluation of several pricy bars of soap.1: poor2: ok3: good4: awesome5: perfectionSmell: quality of scentSmell strength: potency of scentExfoliation: aggressiveness of exfoliating particlesCleaning: cleaning greasy handsSkin feel: how my skin feels after washingBaxter of California Men's Exfoliating Body BarSmell: 5/5 smells of woodSmell strength 4/5Exfoliation: 4.5/5. Sometimes too aggressiveCleaning: 4.5/5 even beats some pumice hand cleanersSkin feel: 5/5 best everScore: 23Notes: Awesome soap. Best smell and skin feel of any soap I have tried. Exfoliation can be a bit aggressive to us on more sensitive skin.C.O. Bigelow Mentha Body Exfoliating Bar SoapSmell: 4.5/5 mintySmell strength 3.5/5Exfoliation: 3.5/5Cleaning: 3.5/5Skin feel: 4/5 refreshingScore: 19Notes: Great soap. I wish it was a little stronger smelling and more aggressive with exfoliation.Jack Black Turbo Body BarSmell: 4/5 slightly mintySmell strength: 2.5/5Exfoliation: 3/5 AverageCleaning: 3.5/5 good,Skin feel: 3.5/5 slightly waxy feelScore: 16.5Notes: Good Soap. The scent is a bit underpowered and it can leave your skin feeling a bit waxy. Overall I think it is worth a try.V76 Detox Bar SoapSmell: 4/5 pleasant lemonySmell strength: 2/5Exfoliation: 2/5Cleaning: 4/5Skin feel: 4/5Score: 16Notes: Only a 5 ounce bar. Very little exfoliationIrish Spring Signature Exfoliating Bar SoapSmell: 4/5Smell strength: 3.5/5Exfoliation: 2/5Cleaning: 3/5Skin feel: 3/5 slightly waxy feelScore: 15Notes: large bar. Cheaper. Decent soap but not very aggressive with exfoliation.Pre De Provence Citrus Soap BarSmell: 2/5 citrus and herbSmell strength: 3/5Exfoliation: 2.5/5Cleaning: 3.5/5Skin feel: 3/5Score: 14Notes: My least favorite. Smell was off, and nothing stood out to be worth the cost.

reviews.reviewTitle: El mejor jabon en barra para hombres
reviews.reviewText: Excelente producto que ayuda a exfoliar y que te deja un agradable olor en el curpo, el precio del producto vale la calidad que ofrecen

reviews.reviewTitle: Einfach zu teuer und hält nicht was sie verspricht.
reviews.reviewText: Ich hatte mich für diese Seife entschieden weil die Resonanzen einen guten Geruch und auch positive Eigenschaften hatte. Leider muss ich festellen, dass dem überhaupt nicht so ist. Der Geruch ist überhaupt nicht vorhanden außer der Fabrik(Herstellungs.) Geruch und die Haut klebt nach der Anwendung. Ich bin maßlos enttäuscht von dieser Seife und deshalb nur 1 Stern.

I cant describe how amazing this soap is. I watched a soap review on this on a youtube channel called the barsoap guy. This is a manly scented soap. Very rich and thick lather. Lathers up very quickly and washes off easily. I do a double lather and double rinse and the soap smell lasts on me for hours. Very noticeable. You get what you pay for. This one bar is worth more than 12 bars of dove or any other generic soap. Your body and nose will love you. I will be reviewing this on my youtube as well. Enjoy gentlemen!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 29, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: Great bar of soap with lovely smell.
reviews.reviewText: Trying to do my bit for the environment by going plastic free, and tried switching from plastic bottle shower gels to bars of soap.Baxter of California is a brand that I have always liked and most of the time I have had good results (though their face scrubs have a habit of making my face a bit blotchy).Purchased their soap bar and it was excellent.Really nice and refreshing scent to it.Large enough bar, but felt it did not last as long as I hoped it would have.All in all really impressed and will be buying this product again.
